title: Statement by the Press Secretary on the Preservation of Access to Care for Medicare Beneficiaries and Pension Relief Act | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Press Secretary


For Immediate Release
June 25, 2010

 



Statement by the Press Secretary on the Preservation of Access to Care for Medicare Beneficiaries and Pension Relief Act




On Friday, June 25, 2010 the President signed into law:
H.R. 3962, the “Preservation of Access to Care for Medicare Beneficiaries and Pension Relief Act of 2010,” which provides for a Medicare physician payment rate update and provides single and multiple employer pension plan sponsors with relief from pension funding requirements.
